item.title: Minecraft Script
item.description:
GitHub: https://github.evanbueno.com
About I am currently in the works of creating a minecraft script for easy and fast mangment of minecraft servers using bash. Features Create Minecraft Server Backup Server (in the works) Create a start.sh File (in the works) Delete World(s) (in the works) Startup Server (in the works) Code Code Main Script: minecraft.sh #!/bin/bash if [ "$EUID" -ne 0 ]; then echo "Please run the script as root.
